txt.en:
'I sent Kaldi off to the Vile Maw to open the doors of the channel in preparation for the work to be done there. I have not heard back from him, but I thought that maybe he was just dawdling. Now, I wonder.

'Please, [placeholder], make your way to the Vile Maw, west and a little north of here, and see if Kaldi is still there. I would feel terrible if anything happened to him.

'If he needs help, give it to him!'
'It is good to know that Indrith is worried about me, though he need not be. Kaldi is no fool, my friend.'
'I sent Kaldi west to start preparations in the Vile Maw. I had thought it a good idea, but now I am not so certain. Please go and check if Kaldi is still alive and well.'
The Water-works is a site of importance to the dwarves who wish to remain in Moria. Once such dwarf, Foreman Indrith, has made it a mission to repair the channel there.
Talk to Kaldi at the entrance to the Vile Maw

Kaldi should be in the Vile Maw, west and a little north of the Great Wheel.\n\nForeman Indrith fears that he may have sent his worker and friend Kaldi to his death. He has sent you to a camp where he believes Kaldi should be.
